title: Is Milan-San Remo Too Long? Debating the Delights and Downfalls of the Mega-Distance Monument
content:
Snoozer or stunner: Does the endless waiting and enormous explosion of MSR make for good racing? Our editors face off.

Read the full article at Is Milan-San Remo Too Long? Debating the Delights and Downfalls of the Mega-Distance Monument on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
